info.author: Hannes Matuschek
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU Library or Lesser General Public License (LGPL)
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
PyGTKCodeBuffer is a syntax-highlighting engine written in pure 
Python to provide maximum portability. It depends only on PyGTK and the Python 
standard library. No Gnome nor Scintilla libraries are needed so it should run 
perfectly under all platforms supported by PyGTK!
info.name: PyGTKCodeBuffer
info.summary: PyGTKCodeBuffer - Lightweight syntax-highlighting for PyGTK's TextView-widget.
info.html_description: PyGTKCodeBuffer is a syntax-highlighting engine written in pure Python to provide maximum portability. It depends only on PyGTK and the Python standard library. No Gnome nor Scintilla libraries are needed so it should run perfectly under all platforms supported by PyGTK!
